statements: SELECT * FROM art_sales_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_details FROM art_sales_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Cash';
SELECT payment_amount, shipping_address FROM art_sales_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM art_sales_transactions WHERE payment_amount > 500;
SELECT payment_method, payment_amount, shipping_address FROM art_sales_transactions ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM art_sales_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, shipping_address FROM art_sales_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_method, payment_amount FROM art_sales_transactions WHERE purchase_details LIKE '%painting%';
SELECT * FROM art_sales_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS average_payment, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM art_sales_transactions;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE artwork_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 100;
SELECT purchase_id, buyer_id, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE buyer_id = 10;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier, shipped_date FROM shipments WHERE delivery_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000
SELECT purchase_id, buyer_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE artwork_id = 5
SELECT MAX(purchase_amount) AS highest_amount FROM purchases
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY buyer_id
SELECT p.purchase_id, p.purchase_date, s.shipped_date FROM purchases p INNER JOIN shipments s ON p.purchase_id = s.purchase_id
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, buyer_id, price FROM purchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, price FROM purchases WHERE buyer_id = 123;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, buyer_id, artwork_id, price FROM purchases JOIN payments ON purchases.purchase_id = payments.purchase_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments JOIN purchases ON payments.purchase_id = purchases.purchase_id;
SELECT * FROM shipping_info WHERE shipping_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, total_price, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE price > 500;
SELECT artwork_name, price FROM artworks ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_id ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT purchases.*, payments.payment_date FROM purchases JOIN payments ON purchases.purchase_id = payments.purchase_id WHERE payments.payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date LIMIT 5

SELECT artworks.artwork_name, artworks.price, artists.artist_name FROM artworks JOIN artists ON artworks.artist_id = artists.artist_id WHERE artworks.price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY artworks.price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1020 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT purchases.purchase_date, artworks.artwork_name, artworks.price, payments.payment_amount FROM purchases JOIN artworks ON purchases.artwork_id = artworks.artwork_id JOIN payments ON purchases.purchase_id = payments.purchase_id WHERE purchases.total_price > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, artworks.price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM artworks;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_id, price FROM artworks WHERE artist_id = 2;
SELECT purchase_id, artwork_name, price FROM purchases JOIN artworks ON purchases.artwork_id = artworks.artwork_id;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT artwork_name, price FROM artworks WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT buyer_id, COUNT(*) FROM purchases GROUP BY buyer_id;
SELECT p.purchase_id, a.artist_name, py.amount FROM purchases p JOIN artworks a ON p.artwork_id = a.artwork_id JOIN payments py ON p.purchase_id = py.purchase_id;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French';
